briefTitle: Efficacy of Peginterferon Alfa-2b in Previously Untreated Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis B and D Co-infection (Study P04603)
officialTitle: An Open Label, Uncontrolled, Study to Assess the Response of Peg-Intron in na√Øve Patients With Chronic Hepatitis B and D Co-infection
summary: The objective of this study is to determine the effectiveness of peginterferon alfa-2b 1.5 mcg/kg/week administered for 52 weeks (wk) in previously untreated participants coinfected with hepatitis virus B and D. After 52-week treatment and 52-week follow-up, the virologic, biochemical, and histological response will be evaluated.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With a Virological Response
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 52 weeks (end of treatment [EOT]), 104 weeks (end of follow-up [EOF]) following treatment initiation
